data.name: Project Morpheus: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Project: Morpheus, in this prologue packed with around 1-3 hours of content, you will reprise yourself as EAST, and play your way in this world where reality and dreams collide.

Key Features


  • Solve the mysteries, escape the nightmare

EAST, a veteran who encountered an accident during a trip, woke up finding himself in a completely strange wilderness.
Unravel mysteries as you venture into this space, where secrets were hidden.


  • Explore, search and manage your resources

Solve puzzles, collect resources, gather information and everything that can help you to survive.
The special physical inventory system will future challenge you to fit items with limited spaces, and manage encumbrance at the same time.


  • Plan your strategy, progress through the crisis

The use of each prop and every bullet is very important.
Choose the right tools and strategy to face or escape from your enemies.



- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

A word from the team

We are a game development studio dedicated to creating action-adventure FPS/TPS games, for PC and consoles.
The team currently consists of 1 game designer and 1 lead programmer. And we are looking for inspirational individuals who share the same vision to join our team.

data.short_description: Welcome to Project: Morpheus, you will reprise yourself as EAST, and play your way in this world where reality and dreams collide.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or an equivalent with four plus core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent 3 GB VRAM card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Project: Morpheus Prologue is a third person shooting game, therefore the use of guns, imagery of violence, death and injury might occur.
